name: PEACEMAKER (itch) (PROJECTaroid)
description:
This is my first 2d pixel art game using Godot. I used Lux Jam II as an opportunity to learn how to use the Godot game engine and to make pixel art. All my past games have been 3d and made with Untiy.  Game submission for Lux Jam II

CONTROLS
Game can be played with keyboard or controller
Move - WASD / Arrow Keys / L-stick on Xbox Style ControllerHack - E / X-button on Xbox Style Controller
Attack - Space / A-button on Xbox Style Controller

CREDITS
Game, Art, and Music by Roger || PROJECTaroid
Made using Godot, Pixelorama, and Reaper
Much of the code was learned from HeartBeast's 1-bit course.
Additional sound effects made using sfxr by Tomas Pettersson
Poxel font made by Hugo Victor
